record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - January 22, 2008)

[Page: S154]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the following people be allowed privileges of the floor: Susan Hinck, Elise Stein, Mollie Lane, Kayleigh Brown, Michael Bagel, and Emily Schwartz.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, on behalf of Senator Inouye, I wish to request unanimous consent that Ms. Cheryl Peterson, a public health nurse fellow from the Indian Health Service, who is serving on his staff, be permitted floor privileges for the duration of S. 1200, the Indian health bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
